revised_title: On the Resolution of Attractive Forces and Attraction of Surfaces and Solids
tldr: The author, Edward Waring, explores the resolution of attractive forces acting on a point and the attraction of surfaces and solids on a given point. He develops methods to calculate the force resulting from multiple forces acting on a point and applies these methods to problems involving lines, surfaces, and solids. This work contributes to the understanding of attraction laws and the mathematical foundations of mechanics.
